outline:
1. to swallow down, swallow up, engulf, eat up
    1. (Qal)
      1. to swallow down
      2. to swallow up, engulf
    2. (Niphal) to be swallowed up
    3. (Piel)
      1. to swallow
      2. to swallow up, engulf
      3. squandering (fig.)
    4. (Pual) to be swallowed up
    5. (Hithpael) to be ended
kjv_def: cover, destroy, devour, eat up, be at end, spend up, swallow down (up).
strongs_def: to make away with (specifically by swallowing); generally, to destroy
